Articles.Content: I was watching a stream and at some point the guy hovered the mouse over some part that looked like a telescope. He was doing something else, so he didn't leave the mouse over for enough time for me to see what it was. Any of people have any ideas as to what it is used for?
I guess you're talking about the ground not-karbonite ressource radar thingy?
I don't know, it happened too fast and I didn't have the screen maximized... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
I belive That is the narrow-band recource scanner.

When I noticed that I immediately hoped for some usable ground/space telescope technology so we can actually use the R/D's observatories. Hopefully the 1.1 or 1.2 update will include something like that.
